overview:
Norman Ortiz is an Entrepreneur with 12+ years of experience in software development, focusing on Mobile and Internet technologies. When it comes to leadership, Norman is a natural born leader with over 25 years leading others achieve their best. As an extreme perfectionist and professional in his areas of expertise, quality, functionality and graphic style is always very important to him.

Norman has held positions as Project Lead, Bi and Data Analysis Manager, Systems and Programmer Analyst among other roles and responsabilities in the technology sector. Norman also have over 8 years of experience in the Pharmaceutical industry.

Norman is also the founder of iGenApps Inc, a software/service that allows anyone to create and design their own mobile app from a mobile device and without programming.

Norman holds a bachelorâ€™s degree in Industrial Engineering from the University of Puerto Rico and a Master’s degree in Operations Management from Ashburry University. Norman also have aquired 80% of the MBA curriculum for a Master’s degree in Marketing at Phoenix University.

At the young age of 16 and already an Eagle Scout, Norman was able to lead his Scout Troop for an entire year while still in high school. During college, Norman was an active member of SHPE among other social activities and events, became part of the Disney College Program in 1998 and started working on his thesis with Lucent Technologies in his last year of college.

Norman is a US citizen, fully bilingual (English and Spanish) and willing to travel and relocate to any metropolitan city in the US.

Specialties Startups, Business Analysis, Project Management, Process Improvement, Software development, iPhone Apps development, Graphic Design
